title: Patriots, preseason, Colin Kaepernick, and the Lakers
itunes:title: Patriots, preseason, Colin Kaepernick, and the Lakers
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb breaks down the injuries during the NFL preseason, the New England Patriots making a statement, John Elway's comments about QB Colin Kaepernick, the differences between New York Jets QB Sam Darnold and Arizona Cardinals QB Josh Rosen, and Jeanie Buss' comments about some "fans" not happy about LeBron James signing with the Los Angeles Lakers. Guests include Ben Volin, Rashad Jennings, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
